description: Aspire Global plc engages in the provision of online gaming solutions. The company employs 496 full-time employees The company went IPO on 2017-07-11. The firm provides an advanced solution combining a robust platform, interactive games, and a set of comprehensive operational services. it operates through two segments: B2B and Business to Customer (B2C). The company offers its B2B partners a full-service solution for launching and operating online casinos. The company operates several proprietary casino brands, such as Karamba and Hopa, based on the same operational setup and technical platform that is offered to partners. Its IGaming solutions include customer relation management (CRM), licenses, payment and risk, account manager, regulations and compliance, and analysis.
name: Aspire Global PLC
